_meanings:
{@--1@} Separation of the 
component parts of a compound, or of
other grammatical forms.

{@--2@} The
mark or interval of such a 

separation; {#samAse'vagraho TasvasamakAlaH#}.

{@--3@} The
syllable or letter after which such
separation occurs; {#fdavagrahAt#}  
<ls>P. VIII. 4. 26</ls>.

{@--11@} A sort
of knowledge, a false idea.

{@--13@} An 
imprecation, a term of abuse.

{@--14@} An
iron hook with which elephants
are driven.
